name: post-deleteDisputeDefenseDocument
description: Deletes a specific dispute defense document that was supplied earlier.

defenseDocumentType.description: The document type code of the defense document.

disputePspReference.description: The PSP reference assigned to the dispute.

merchantAccountCode.description: The merchant account identifier, for which you want to process the dispute transaction.

$ul: **disputeServiceResult**
**errorMessage**: The general error message.
**success**: Indicates whether the request succeeded.
**errorCode**: The error code mapped to the error message.
**errorType**: The category of the error.
**message**: A short explanation of the issue.
**pspReference**: The PSP reference of the payment.
**status**: The HTTP response status.
